document.docAuthor: García-Prieto, Luis, Garcia-Varela, Martín, Mendoza-Garfias, Berenit & León, Gerardo Pérez-Ponce De
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Acanthocephala in wildlife vertebrates of Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Acanthocephala in wildlife vertebrates of Mexico

subSubSection.paragraph:
SONORA: NA:
Pachymedusa dacnicolor (Goldberg & Bursey 2002 )
; Yecora:
Lithobates tarahumarae (Bursey & Goldberg 2001 )
.

BAJA CALIFORNIA, CHIHUAHUA, COAHUILA, DURANGO, SINALOA, SONORA: NA:
Rhinocheilus lecontei
(
Goldberg et al . 1998 a
). BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR: La Paz:
Urosaurus nigricaudus
(
Goldberg et al . 2003 a
). CHIHUAHUA, SONORA: NA:
Crotalus willardi
(
Goldberg & Bursey 2000 a
). HIDALGO: 1 milla S de Santa Mónica:
Conopsis lineata
(
Goldberg & Bursey 2004 c
). MICHOACÁN: 38 millas S of Nueva Italia :
Salvadora mexicana
(
Goldberg & Bursey 2004 a
). PUEBLA: NA:
Oxybelis aeneus (Goldberg & Bursey 2001 )
. SINALOA: Carretera 15 , Palmillas-Escuinapa:
Leptodeira maculata
(
Goldberg & Bursey 2004 c
). SONORA: Cananea :
Phrynosoma ditmarsi
(
Goldberg & Bursey 2000 b
); Choquincahui:
Oxybelis aeneus (Goldberg & Bursey 2001 )
; Minas Nuevas:
Coluber mentovarius
(
Goldberg & Bursey 2004 a
); 20 millas E de Navojoa:
Trimorphodon tau
(
Goldberg & Bursey 2004 a
).

Specimens deposited : USNPC ( 89184, 89269 , 89819, 90585 , 91935, 91978 , 92435, 95048 - 49, 95059 ).
Oligacanthorhynchus iheringi
Travassos, 1917

NAYARIT: Presa de Aguamilpa:
Buteo lineatus (
Prado-Ancona 1993
)
.
Oligacanthorhynchus tortuosa (
Leidy, 1850
)

COLIMA: Centro Acuícola Xala (Tecoman)**:
Didelphis virginiana
. CHIAPAS: Cascadas de Agua Azul:
Didelphis virginiana (
Prado-Ancona 1993
)
. MICHOACÁN: Agua Blanca:
Didelphis virginiana (
Prado-Ancona 1993
)
. MORELOS: Progreso:
Didelphis virginiana
( CNHE ). OAXACA: Centro Acuícola de Temascal:
Didelphis virginiana (
García-Varela et al . 2000
)
. TABASCO: Ranchería El Boquerón (Centro)**:
Didelphis marsupialis
; Río Oxolotlán:
Philander opossum (
Prado-Ancona 1993
)
. VERACRUZ: Arroyo Balzapote:
Didelphis virginiana (
Cañeda-Guzmán 1997
)
; Ejido Lázaro Cárdenas, Laguna Escondida:
Didelphis marsupialis (
Cañeda-Guzmán 1997
)
; Estación de Biología Los Tuxtlas:
Didelphis marsupialis (
Prado-Ancona 1993
)
,
Didelphis virginiana
(
Prado-Ancona 1993
;
Cañeda-Guzmán 1997
); Playa Escondida:
Didelphis virginiana , Philander opossum
(
Cañeda-Guzmán 1997
); Sierra de Santa Martha:
Nasua narica (
Prado-Ancona 1993
)
.

Specimens deposited : CNHE ( 607 -11, 612, 619, 2965 , 4497, 4779 , 5074 ).
Oncicola luehei (
Travassos, 1917
)
(Figures 7-8 )

VERACRUZ: Estación de Biología Los Tuxtlas:
Smilisca cyanosticta
(
Goldberg et al . 2002 b
). Mammalia (A): Intestine.

VERACRUZ: Ejido Lázaro Cárdenas, Playa Escondida:
Didelphis virginiana (
Cañeda-Guzmán 1997
)
; Estación de Biología Los Tuxtlas:
Didelphis virginiana (
Prado-Ancona 1993
)
.
Oncicola
sp
.

GUERRERO: San Pedro Las Playas (Laguna de Tres Palos):
Lithobates cf. forreri (
Cabrera-Guzmán et al . 2007
)
. VERACRUZ: Laguna Escondida:
Lithobates vaillanti (
Paredes-Calderón et al . 2004
)
. YUCATÁN: Lagunas de Yalahau:
Rhinella marina (
Espínola-Novelo & Guillén-Hernández 2008
)
.

Notes : This species was described as
Prosthenorchis spirula
, and transferred to
Oncicola
by
Schmidt ( 1972 )
.

COLIMA: La Esperanza:
Didelphis virginiana (
Lamothe-Argumedo et al . 1981
)
. GUERRERO: Puerto Marqués:
Spilogale pygmaea
(
Salgado-Maldonado 1979 b
).

Notes : Records of the specimens of Guerrero were published as
Prosthenorchis rugosus
Machado, 1950
[currently
Pachysentis rugosus (
Machado, 1950
)
] by
López-Forment & Urbano ( 1979 )
;
Salgado-Maldonado ( 1979 b)
re-identified this material as
P. gethi
without clarify this situation.

VERACRUZ: Laguna Escondida:
Rhinella marina (
Galicia-Guerrero et al . 2000
)
.
Plagiorhynchidae Golvan

SONORA:
Bahía de Guaymas:
Larus
sp. (
Linton 1892
)
.

Notes : This species was described as
Echinorhynchus rectus
by
Linton ( 1892 )
, and transferred to
Plagiorhynchus
by
Van Cleave ( 1918 )
.

VERACRUZ: Laguna de Alvarado:
Cichlasoma urophthalmus (
Trujillo-Álvarez 1995
)
.

Notes : Material identified as
Prosthorhynchus
sp., which is considered a subgenus of
Plagiorhynchus (
Amin, 1985
)
.

VERACRUZ: Laguna Escondida:
Lithobates vaillanti (
Paredes-Calderón et al . 2004
)
.

bibRefCitation.author: Salgado-Maldonado
bibRefCitation.refString: Salgado-Maldonado, G. & Cruz-Reyes, A. (2002) Porrorchis nickoli n. sp. (Acanthocephala: Plagiorhynchidae) from mammals in Southeastern Mexico, first known occurrence of Porrorchis in the Western Hemisphere. Journal of Parasitology, 88, 146 - 152.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Notes : Recorded by
Prado-Ancona ( 1993 )
and
Cañeda-Guzmán ( 1997 )
as
Longisoma marsupialis
Prado, 1993
, invalid specific name only published in both Bachelor thesis.
